beginner.title: Find Your Seat
beginner.description: Learn how to sit comfortably (chair, cushion, or floor).

beginner.title: Gentle Breathing
beginner.description: Focus on slow inhales & exhales (2–5 minutes).

beginner.title: Body Awareness
beginner.description: Scan your body from head to toe, release tension.

beginner.title: Counting the Breath
beginner.description: Count from 1 to 10 with each inhale/exhale cycle.

beginner.title: Anchor to the Present
beginner.description: Notice when your mind wanders, return to breath.

beginner.title: Guided Relaxation
beginner.description: Use short guided meditations to stay focused.

beginner.title: Noticing Thoughts
beginner.description: Watch thoughts without judgment, like clouds passing.

beginner.title: Gratitude Moment
beginner.description: End meditation by reflecting on one thing you’re grateful for.

beginner.title: Build Consistency
beginner.description: Practice daily for at least 2 weeks before moving on.

intermediate.title: Posture Refinement
intermediate.description: Sit with alert yet relaxed spine.

intermediate.title: Labeling Thoughts
intermediate.description: Notice and name thoughts like 'thinking', 'planning', 'remembering', then return to breath.

intermediate.title: Open Awareness
intermediate.description: Notice sounds, sensations, and surroundings without reacting.

intermediate.title: Loving-Kindness
intermediate.description: Send kindness first to yourself, then to others.

intermediate.title: Visualization
intermediate.description: Picture calming imagery (forest, ocean, candle flame).

intermediate.title: Walking Meditation
intermediate.description: Sync slow walking with breath awareness.

intermediate.title: Emotional Awareness
intermediate.description: Observe emotions as sensations in body, not identity.

intermediate.title: Mindful Pauses
intermediate.description: Practice short meditations during daily activities.

intermediate.title: 21-Day Routine
intermediate.description: Practice 15–20 minutes daily with variety (breath, body, loving-kindness).

advanced.title: Breathless Awareness
advanced.description: Let go of controlling breath, observe naturally.

advanced.title: Choiceless Awareness
advanced.description: Open attention to everything without preference.

advanced.title: Deep Body Scan
advanced.description: Explore micro-sensations like tingling, warmth, vibration.

advanced.title: Mantra Meditation
advanced.description: Repeat a sacred word/sound (e.g., 'Om') to deepen focus.

advanced.title: Silence Practice
advanced.description: Meditate without guidance, no music, just awareness.

advanced.title: Shadow Work
advanced.description: Notice and accept difficult emotions or inner resistance.

advanced.title: Compassion Practice
advanced.description: Extend empathy even toward those who challenge you.

advanced.title: Non-Dual Awareness
advanced.description: Explore the sense of 'observer' dissolving into experience.

advanced.title: Retreat Practice
advanced.description: Try extended meditation (half-day, full-day, or weekend retreat).
